entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Box helpers do not handle null-valued managed pointers #70268
  • Consider adding JsonConverter for BinaryData that converts to Base64 string #70267
  • Test failure: JIT\Regression\JitBlue\GitHub_21990\GitHub_21990\GitHub_21990.cmd #70263
  • Assertion failed: get_region_gen_num (region) == 0 #70262
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(type)' #70260
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: Compiler optimization assumption invalid: FAILED: pMgr != 0 #70259
    7.0.0
  • OSX/Interop.libc.cs functions should be replaced by System.Native shim functions #70253
  • Unsupported features to Cross Compile to linux-arm64 on wsl and also osx #70250

Closed

  • SpinLock should be a class, not a struct #70266
  • StressTestDeepNestingOfConcat takes a lot longer on NonBacktracking than other engines #60645
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix3x2Tests.Matrix3x2CreateRotationCenterTest #70261
    7.0.0
  • CreateSymbolicLink is either buggy or unnecessarily expensive #70123
    7.0.0
  • EBCDIC en/decoding in System.Text does not work #68970

PullRequests

Created

  • Always use portable tailcalling mechanism for delegate tailcalls #70269
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not retype SIMD nodes #70265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unpin locals #70264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-disable `Runtime_56953` #70258
    7.0.0
  • Fixed obsolete comment details on System.Convert #70257
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono][interp] Fix performance regression #70255
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Delete some dead util code #70254
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix: [Wasm] Restore _free default export for Emcc 3.1.7 or later #70245
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: CreateSymbolicLink: remove unused statement. #70252
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix regex outerloop tests #70246
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #70236
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP: Add private {ReadOnly}Span ctor that takes a ref, index and length #70240
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add support for symbol stripping #70233
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • NonBacktracking inner matching loop optimizations #70217
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fold System.Private.Reflection.Metadata into Corelib #70241
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable the pause intrinsic test for x86/x64 CoreCLR #70230
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Test early md array lowering #70193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PackageValidation enqueues work items for strict mode true and false #25853
  • [dotnet cli]: resolve msbuild properties in launchsettings.json like what Visual Studio IDE #25852

PullRequests

Created

  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add support for specifying launch profile to `dotnet watch run` #25832
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Open issues for `ref` fields #6149

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Found unused compiler generated class when working with Linq.Expressions #61711

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61710
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

Merged

  • Remove usage of IOptionService from WorkCoordinator #61712
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add collapsedText to foldingRange #61590
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61708
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #61707
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61706
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61705
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61713
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use fast in-proc heuristic to implement HasChangesAsync #61690
    Interactive-EnC, 17.3
  • Solution options #61406
    Area-IDE
  • Add a hack to remove output from the Razor generator if suppressed #61675
    Area-IDE
  • Replace conditional with assignment #61697
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BlazorWebView from Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Wpf should be working with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication #42046
  • Specifying when custom event handlers in Blazor surface to the IDE. #42045
  • Minimal API: Route Handler Filter does not show errors list #42044
  • Signal R - Error: Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message from the server #42043
  • Stackable Pages i.e. Multiple Pages on Top of Each Other Like MdiContainer In Winform #42041

Closed

  • Add support for specifying a launch profile to `dotnet watch run` #41988
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: plaintext #42038
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #42042
  • SignalR: Distributed HubConnectionStore #42011
  • Blazor Server Side: Implement a simple way to dispose of components #42015
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943

PullRequests

Updated

  • Look at IIS functionals #41995
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DesignMode.IsDesignModeEnabled not working as expected. #7773
  • Maui Splash Screen on Android using wrong svg icon #7772
  • CollectionView not updating when direct content of ContentPresenter #7770
  • Shell: Flyoutitems IsVisible set false - what is expected behaviour? #7769
  • [Android] SplashScreen Scalingproblem #7768
  • [Mac] Cannot show the scrollbars always using the Scrollbars visibility property "Always" #7767
  • [Windows] Scrollbars Visibility property "Always" is not working consistently in the ScrollView control #7766
  • The RuntimeIdentifier 'ios-arm64' is invalid. #7765
  • Border Margin #7764
  • FlyoutBackgroundImage Not showing Windows and Crashes IOS #7763
  • Having trouble getting started #7762

Closed

  • Android Emulator would not start #7750

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix TemplatedView #7771
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow ObservableCollection for array-valued columns for "deep" change tracking proxies #28162
  • EF Core connection performance with Managed Identity is slow #28161
  • Many to many with navigation properties throw exceptions #28160

Closed

  • Deadlock in EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions.ToListAsync if used with synchronization context #28159
  • Set operations for shared type entities are not working #28146
